Title: 41762 - No Digital Camera? Here's What You're Missing
Direction: 675 words. List 4-8 reasons people should invest in digital cameras instead of relying solely on a smartphone camera. Vary the reasons; don't just talk about a bunch of camera features, but also discuss things like saving phone battery and getting more professional-looking photos. Your audience likes learning about gadgets and tech, so it's time to reintroduce them to the digital camera. The anchor text will fit in any section that talks about the superior features of a digital camera. Please make sure that you do not mention any products that are competitors of Sony.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: purchasing the best digital camera
